title: PBE Downloading / Installing bugs?
body: I installed and downloaded the PBE, made my account and realized I had to restart my client to get my RP and IP. Go to the launcher, click it, and i have to download everything again? Is this a mistake... ??

replies.body: Where did you install the PBE client to? If you simply launched it from the directory rather than moving it to its own, then this will happen. Be sure you've installed the PBE using [**these instructions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204894140-Installing-the-PBE-Client) to ensure everything will patch normally.
